label: Barberfish
description: Like barberfish cleaning sharks, this extension removes data parasites from your Hammerhead Karoo. Features: Randonneur average speed including paused time, and enhanced triple data field with native Karoo integration.
releaseNotes: Enhanced v0.2: Upgraded Triple data field with native Karoo design language, smoothing variants (3s/5s/10s/30s averages), zone colors and numbers, per-field configuration for data type/smoothing/zones. Maintains existing Randonneur functionality.
